description:
The 7th installment of the fictional "GAME BUDDY" portable game console series
Here comes the horizontal shooter!

Vulcan, laser, missile.
Power up your unique weapons and prepare for powerful enemies.

Orbs" accompanying your ship.
Each orb can be equipped with different power-up items.
Customize the most powerful equipment of your dreams!

Devise your own orb formation to conquer difficult stages.

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switchâ„¢.
name: Pixel Game Maker Series VERZEUS
intro: The latest in a long line of old school type horizontal shooters!
